Title: Illuminated Incipit with Headpiece
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.649 is an illuminated incipit page with a headpiece that bears the basmalah in the lower rectangle.
Keywords: Islamic; Mughal; Persian; Safavid; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; India; Iran
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Muhammad Riza Naw'i Khabushani (died 1019 AH/AD 1610)
